abstract: Colombian Pres Juan Manuel Santos apologizes for 1985 army raid on guerrillas who had taken Supreme Court building hostage, which resulted in almost 100 fatalities.
lead_paragraph: President Juan Manuel Santos apologized for a 1985 raid on the Supreme Court in which nearly 100 people were killed after the building was taken over by guerrillas.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Colombia: Apology for Army Raid

snippet: President Juan Manuel Santos apologized for a 1985 raid on the Supreme Court in which nearly 100 people were killed after the building was taken over by guerrillas.
